Specimen Type: Whole blood (anticoagulated with EDTA or sodium citrate)
Purpose: To determine the SLCO1B1 genotype to guide personalized statin therapy.
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, Real-Time PCR instrument (e.g., Thermo Fisher QuantStudio 5), SLCO1B1 genotyping assay (e.g., TaqMan SNP Genotyping Assays)
